title: Sleek Facepak
summary: Sleek is a watch face for the application Face for Android Wear.
description: This watch has custom styling of an aluminum high grade watch with the pin point accuracy from the second hand.  When on dim mode the seconds change to outside dashes to give it a streamlined dim look. You will be sure to turn hands with this full custom sleek watch face for your Android Wear device.*YOU MUST HAVE THE APP "FACE" TO USE THIS FACE https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=boxcrab.face
descriptionHTML:
This watch has custom styling of an aluminum high grade watch with the pin point accuracy from the second hand. When on dim mode the seconds change to outside dashes to give it a streamlined dim look. You will be sure to turn hands with this full custom sleek watch face for your Android Wear device.

*YOU MUST HAVE THE APP "FACE" TO USE THIS FACE
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=boxcrab.face
comments: Doesn't work This face does not show up on watch. Re-installed, rebooted both phone and watch and still no watch face.
Can't find The watchface doesn't show up on my clock?
Great face One of my favorite faces yet,  keep them coming,  thanks
recentChanges: Updated to make way for the newest code in the updated Face app.  Added some new tires, these tires will improve the the handling of the app...
